title: [BUG] pycharm tests not running with `setup.cfg` pytest arguments
body:
**Describe the bug**
<!--
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.
-->
Changes made to setup.cfg in pr #2535 cause pytest to not be able to find run (in particular using pycharm).

![Screenshot 2022-07-09 at 21 23 39](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4674372/178121445-7ca6513f-8a2e-40bb-8839-8501e302b8e5.png)


**To Reproduce**
<!--
Add a Minimal, Complete, and Verifiable example (for more details, see e.g. https://stackoverflow.com/help/mcve

If the code is too long, feel free to put it in a public gist and link it in the issue: https://gist.github.com
-->
Pycharm version 2022.1.3
Try running any test. I've run into the issue on both macos and windows.

**Expected behavior**
<!--
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.
-->

**Additional context**
<!--
Add any other context about the problem here.
-->
In order to make sktime run I have to delete the following lines from setup.cfg:
    --durations 10
    --timeout 600
    --cov sktime
    --cov-report xml
    --cov-report html
    --showlocals
    --pyargs
    --verbose
    -n 2

(lines 15-23)
Potentially I've missed a pytest thing here or pycharm is the issue just thought I'd raise it so people were aware Im having the problem on multiple operating systems using Pycharm.
